Posts.EditableText:
This is Minecraft Hardcore, the text adventure.
You are one of the last surviving people. Fight, Craft, Mine, play to your hearts content.
Rated PG or 10+ for fighting and zombies.
I need players to test the game!
http://textadventures.co.uk/games/view/kn5lvk1qqkef8rsarzuwbw/fightcraft-hardcore
